DOC.brief_title: Apatinib Mesylate Combined With Pemetrexed Treatment Pretreated Advanced Non-squamous Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: It one-arm study . The progression-free survival evaluate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 18 year 70years . 2 . Histologically cytologically confirm nonsquamous nonsmall cell lung cancer ( stage IIIB/IV ) . 3 . Measurable lesion define RECIST criterion . 4 . Locally advanced lung cancer treat surgery , recurrent metastatic lung cancer 5 . ECOG performance status ( PS ) 0 1 . 6 . Life expectancy ≥3 month . 7 . Informed consent . 1 . Squamous carcinoma ( include adenosquamous carcinoma ) , small cell lung cancer . 2 . Newly diagnosed Central Nervous System ( CNS ) metastases yet definitively treat surgery and/or radiation . 3 . Tumor invade big vessel close big vessel ( less 5mm ) 4 . Obvious cavity necrosis form tumor 5 . Uncontrolled hypertension 6 . Myocardial ischemia infarction stage II , cardiac insufficiency . 7 . Abnormal coagulation ( INR > 1.5 PT > ULN+4 , APTT > 1.5 ULN ) , bleed tendency receive coagulation therapy 8 . The active HBV HCV infection 9 . History malignancy except cure basal cell carcinoma skin carcinoma insitu uterine cervix . 10 . Hemoptysis , 2.5ml daily 11 . Thrombosis 12 month , include pulmonary thrombosis , stoke , deep venous thrombosis . 12 . Unhealed bone fracture wound long time 13 . Received big surgery , bone fracture ulcer 4 week . 14 . Urine protein≥++ , urine protein 24 hours≥1.0g 15 . Use CYP3A4 inhibitor within 7 day CYP3A4 inducer within 12 day prior enrollment 16 . Have receive prior treatment VEGFR TKI ( Bevacizumab permit ) . 17 . Pregnant lactate woman , woman unwilling practice contraception study .
